function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of motivation to engage in regular exercise due to social isolation and quarantine.","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creation of cultures and societies of transition","category":"Cultural and Lifestyle Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Role of cities in creating the climate crisis","category":"Environmental Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Calls for new ethically-based, collaborative and deliberative principles and practices","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact of climate crisis and covid-19 on vulnerable populations","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anthropocentric worldview and human-centered value system","category":"Cultural and Lifestyle Risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Anthropocentric worldview and its impact on disease transmission","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misunderstanding or misinterpretation of indigenous knowledge and practices","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sustained periods of isolation leading to mental health issues and social disconnection","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban inequities leading to differential exposure to unhealthy conditions","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loss of trust in professional expertise and accountability systems","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reductive and fragmented thinking in assessment methods.","category":"Communication and Messaging","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simplification of the context and processes of the systems in assessment methods.","category":"Communication and Messaging","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of as yet unknown factors on societal actions","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on community behaviors and values","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Phased reopening of non-essential stores, bars, and restaurants may contribute to increased social interaction and transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforced curfews may lead to non-compliance and subsequent increase in gatherings during non-curfew hours, leading to higher transmission of contagious disease.","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Population-based approach does not account for age structure of the population, impacting the spread of disease","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stable compliance with a package of ’barrier gestures’ compared to individual components","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in modeling the impact of school closure","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restriction of access to public green spaces due to covid-19 social distancing measures","category":"Access to infrastructure  ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited assessment of the impact of domestic gardens on wellbeing during lockdown","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of assessment of the contribution of urban green space to wellbeing","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited studies on the impact of domestic gardens on psychosocial factors and physical health during lockdown","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias in the survey data due to exclusion of individuals over the age of 70 who were strongly advised to stay at home during lockdown.","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covariate measurements such as living alone, education, and occupational social class may not fully capture the complex socioeconomic and environmental factors influencing health outcomes, leading to confounding effects.","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exclusion of participants with no garden access may introduce selection bias and limit generalizability of results.","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited representation of younger age groups in the sample may skew the results and limit generalizability to a broader age range.","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to private outdoor space for older adults","category":"Access to infrastructure  ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient focus on the impact of domestic spaces on socio-economic and psychological conditions during confinement","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Study of the incidence of home-dwelling relationship in different habitats and urban areas","category":"Cultural and Lifestyle Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The non-probabilistic sample for convenience may introduce bias in the study results and limit the generalizability of findings.","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty conducting group sessions due to private or sensitive subject matter","category":"Communication and Messaging","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of the most vulnerable individuals to explain their reality","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Altered use and occupation habits leading to potential clustering of people","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variety of responses in category 7 may indicate different emotional and spatial needs, possibly reflecting differing living conditions.","category":"Cultural and Lifestyle Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urban dwellings with multiple family members","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of space and resources for leisure and sports activities","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased public support for environmental initiatives","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of support in times of crisis","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global pandemic impact on natural, social, and economic landscapes","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowded apartments","category":"Housing Conditions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of well-being and social relationships through green elements","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to greenery during confinement","category":"Access to infrastructure  ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate privacy and accessibility in living spaces","category":"Housing Conditions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate living space hindering physical distancing and well-being","category":"Housing Conditions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility in co-housing or condominium areas hinders adaptation to increased need for space and social distancing","category":"Housing Conditions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequality in housing conditions","category":"Housing Conditions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unresolved past problems related to housing quality","category":"Housing Conditions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of interdisciplinary approach between technical and health backgrounds","category":"Social
